item.title: mysql_3__循环
item.description: -- WHILE循环 DELIMITER $$ DROP PROCEDURE IF EXISTS mysql_while_loop$$ CREATE PROCEDURE mysql_while_loop() BEGIN DECLARE x INT; DECLARE str VARCHAR(255); SET x = 1; SET str = ''; WHILE x <= 10 DO SET str = CONCAT(str,x,','); SET x = x + 1; END WHILE; SELECT str; END$$ DELIMITER ; CALL mysql_while_loop(); -- --REPEAT循环 DELIMITER $$
